mapper.insert: insert into hz_calendar (resource_id, classroom_id, open_date, is_open, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name, is_delete) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classroomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update hz_calendar set classroom_id = #{classroomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_date = #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator_id = #{updatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator_name = #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select resource_id, classroom_id, open_date, is_open, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name, is_delete from hz_calendar where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
